text: Hello! I'm sorry to ask because I know LC staff is very busy getting everything finished up which I'm very thankful for, but I wanting to ask if we still don't have any additional comments for our second round resume edits does it mean its up to standards or just maybe somebody hasn't gotten around to it? Sorry to ask again. Thank you!

elements.text: Hello! I'm sorry to ask because I know LC staff is very busy getting everything finished up which I'm very thankful for, but I wanting to ask if we still don't have any additional comments for our second round resume edits does it mean its up to standards or just maybe somebody hasn't gotten around to it? Sorry to ask again. Thank you!

text:
Hayden - Melinda posted this in the class announcements channel:

> _We are working very hard to get all round 2 resume edits done today. Before I log off I will contact anyone who does not yet have edits on their resume if we do not get to everyone. If you do not have edits from me/Lexi or a message about it, please reach out on Monday but not before._
So I think if you never received round 2 edits, you should ready out to Lexi and Melinda directly.

But if you are saying you made all round 2 edits and haven't heard anything further, then <https://ptwebdevallhu-iu32728.slack.com/archives/C050WAHU8KT/p1705975563884249?thread_ts=1705975435.683609&cid=C050WAHU8KT|this post> is more relevant:

> we will continue reviewing your resume in rounds and you will get a Slack message when it is approved.
